website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to beauty, versatility, and stylishness, you won't find a better bag by Coach for your money than this reversible option – it's almost like having 2 bags in one.
pros: A classic look by Coach that stands out for being reversible – simply turn it inside out for a completely different look
cons: Ladies who prefer pockets may be disappointed with this bag – the one downside of the reversible design is that it only has one large compartment

customer_reviews.title: My big coach bag
customer_reviews.text: read all the mixed reviews. purchased this bag and glad I did. I love it! Got the black and brown one and it does not feel like rubber or smell bad at all. It simply has no lining for a reason it's reversible. I love not having to zip and unzip a large tote. Also comes with a large sized zip pouch which holds whatever you want to put in it ....makeup.. sunglasses..cell phone...etc. Fashionable on arm or shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag just on the "corner" start to seems old just in 2 weeks :(
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I'm not satisfied with the Coach Signature Reversible
customer_reviews.text: I'm not satisfied with the Coach Signature Reversible, it came with the scraped fabric on the handle. In addition the hanging chain is plastic. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: real deal
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous buying any designer bag on Amazon with all the fakes out there but I had a gift card and the bag I've been coveting for years appeared so I just HAD to! so glad I did - shipping was fast and I don't have Prime, it came with a Coach box, Coach tags, Coach care cards - the whole shebang. This looks exactly like the bag I saw at my Coach outlet store but didn't pull the trigger on - for an even better price than the outlet! Both sides of the bag are pristine. Straps, corners, logos are all perfect on both sides. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love how this bag looks for work
customer_reviews.text: Love how this bag looks for work. Only negative is there are no pockets because it is reversible, but not a negative if you buy a purse organizer insert!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Nice Durable Stylish Carry all
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect as a carryall. I can throw in my stuff and kids stuff but still look pulled together. I had a problem with the first one I ordered. Amazon was great they refunded my money and sent a new one quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sim

customer_reviews.title: Im in love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Coach bag!!! It's very big and I like the color. Best purse I have purchased! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description.A scam.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is a reversible bag when in the inside it has a description of the authenticity written on on a 7In by 4in plastic words sign.Im very disappointed.Now I could only use one side.I feel the price is not reasonable.,and the description is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: anarobles

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a plastic purse
customer_reviews.text: I have had always used Coach and MK purses and wallets and to me this does not seam real. Feels like a plastic purse.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! This is the perfect tote bag for hauling ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! This is the perfect tote bag for hauling around my purse essentials and my diaper bag needs! I can also fit my laptop in the bag if I need.
customer_reviews.author: Karie R

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my purse ! It’s the real deal. I was hesitant when purchasing but I am so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coach Purse reversible
customer_reviews.text: Love the purse, however for the money that was spent on it, there were no tags on it and no duster bag????? This worries me that is it even a real coach purse?
customer_reviews.author: Bernie M

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, not at all flimsy. My fave new bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse so much! It’s great quality and almost exactly what I wanted! I say “almost” because I just wish it had an inside pocket. I made it work though by adding an extra small makeup bag. The bag itself is strong and doesn’t flop over like I’ve seen with Louis Vuitton Neverfulls. That’s saying a lot. It’s quickly become my favorite bag and that’s saying a lot too!
customer_reviews.author: VeggieGirl28

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse for what I needed! Perfect...I always need an everyday tote bag for work. I throw everything in there. I don't need compartments. I need to open it and just take out what I need. I will use it all of spring/summer and then change it up in the fall/winter.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: I will order coach bags again from this company!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compliment on this bag ! Roomy and comfortable to carry ! Durable materials ! Price was reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: cora hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Tote
customer_reviews.text: I love large totes and this one is really nice. I like the size and the color. It does not have any pockets or compartments, but that is not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Coach reversible tote
customer_reviews.text: Love my Coach reversible tote so pretty and it’s well made and it was nice that the seller was making sure I was happy with it that was nice.🙂I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet earnest

customer_reviews.title: Coach Bags
customer_reviews.text: It's universal so either side looks good. I use one side for work and the other for a day out.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Coach at its best
customer_reviews.text: Love it, big enough to be a overnight bag! But I carry it as my everyday purse
customer_reviews.author: C.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Coach Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Also purchased one of the purse/bag inserts so I could be more organized and it works great. I travel a lot for business and I can even slip my laptop into this bag so I'm not having to carry the computer bag on as well. Really nice quality and great for either casual or dressy.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged and missing the coach logo entirely, scratched and worn down corners, the item was clearly used but was sold as new.
customer_reviews.author: Lexrenee

customer_reviews.title: This was for my mom. She loves the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for my mom. She loves the fact that it reverse. Who will not buy this purse. I think I should buy one for my self. Do it come it a different color? LOL..
customer_reviews.author: Tha Brickz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Missing hang tag and the little pouch that supposed to come with it! Pack with just a plastic no dust bag. I am so disappointed and it’s not even look real. Its ridiculous that amazon approved to sell knockoff items here. Pls do some research!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coach Tote
customer_reviews.text: Love, love my Coach tote. It’s reversible. Lovely size and is my go to weekend tote
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Slayed
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this bag I love it
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Bethea

customer_reviews.title: Just want I expected 👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Authentic! Just what I needed! A lot of space of the inside & being reversible is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: It's too big to be used as a purse
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the colors and pattern of this tote. However wasn't aware how big it was, so only gets used on overnight outtings
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Himmelberger

customer_reviews.title: Missing the travel pouch
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars but it did not come with the travel pouch. That would have been nice to have since the inside of the bag does not have pockets and it would have been nice to have the pouch to keep small items in.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Large bag . It’s a coach so it’s coach quality. I use it for work daily
customer_reviews.author: dbull

customer_reviews.title: love Coach, fantastc
customer_reviews.text: love Coach, fantastc, very large size like i love the purses to have all my stuff well fixed and easy to find my keys. love it!
customer_reviews.author: ROUS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect! and the fact that it is reversible fascinates me with everything and has very good size
customer_reviews.author: Karen Delcompare

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have had my purse for about a year now. Very durable. Authentic. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: You what you pay for cheap material cheap looking very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Does not look original
customer_reviews.text: The logo is not real.the new york mentioned is upside down.such a dissappointment.The packing was aweful.bag was folded.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Love the tote
customer_reviews.text: Received exactly as described by the seller. Love the tote! This is a real Coach bag!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Wimberly

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Canvas & stitching feel quality & the print is my favorite part
customer_reviews.author: Chris_0018

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.. goes well with all
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.. goes well with all.. looks even better than in photo .. authentic .. great price.. sturdy and fashionable
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Usher-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Spacious tote
customer_reviews.text: Tote bag very spacious not closed on the edges just what I needed for large space
customer_reviews.author: Chryl87

customer_reviews.title: Two Purses in One!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tote! It’s large enough to carry all of my things and is a perfect travel companion. I really like the reversibility feature...two purses in one!
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned this bag I thought it was a purse didn't realize it was a tote !
customer_reviews.author: Karen Williams

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Met all expectations. Arrived on time and in good order.
customer_reviews.author: sundiver3

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the picture
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t look like the picture the khaki coach symbol part is an ugly brown like poop
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Shimkanin

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it. Every girl should have one!
customer_reviews.text: This is so amazing! I love that it complements all my outfits and is light weight and stays close to my body because it is not stiff!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Whitely

customer_reviews.title: I was really excited to get this purse, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this purse, but when it arrived it was torn. Apparently it got caught in a conveyor belt. So I refused to accept the package and had to get a refund. I want to order it again, but afraid of the same thing happening again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The purse has no inside pockets or zipper pouches of any sort so it is difficult to find items.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted as a gift for my Lady.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thiefs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I paid to have it wrapped and come with a gift card. Neither was done. Thiefs.
customer_reviews.author: Sean R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new purse...The real deal..plus it came with an attached wristlet
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe purse is false! Happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is real! Nothing indicates falsified purse! Wasn’t sure I’d like no clasp, but being able to reach in quickly for my wallet was great! I’m happy with all aspects of purse.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Davis

product_meta.title: Coach Reversible PVC City Signature Tote
product_meta.description:
Coach Reversible City Tote. It is like having two totes into one. This tote comes with a traveling pouch.
